allow:
Bash(# Query 1: Count total alternatives
curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/graphql \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Cookie: keystonejs-session=Fe26.2**f01b43b5a809c74981b635dc8690e89b725b1dafc82b9001b4cd2986d18b446a*jR97gvVwTXthvz8BKLVUwg*11ecm4NkfrXx7ke9ttZ97Vb_jkdq6ILQD_sf0J_Mh1EUZ_Jfvp4Ntx15ONkHn2qFRgZ2u9v8v91H1zpjxdJJSg*1781930136593*1ac5010e49cc94bea22c3e2c01bd4b0c79ab48e39dad7b0f3819b2153a4823aa*R1uGMlKaUxHp8cLTsMSuKS5URMauAhe-cKr9KEq3-Aw" \
  -d '{
    "query": "query CountAlternatives { alternativesCount alternatives { id proprietaryTool { name slug } openSourceTool { name slug } } }"
  }' | jq .)

Bash(# Query 3: Check specific proprietary tools for alternatives
curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/graphql \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Cookie: keystonejs-session=Fe26.2**f01b43b5a809c74981b635dc8690e89b725b1dafc82b9001b4cd2986d18b446a*jR97gvVwTXthvz8BKLVUwg*11ecm4NkfrXx7ke9ttZ97Vb_jkdq6ILQD_sf0J_Mh1EUZ_Jfvp4Ntx15ONkHn2qFRgZ2u9v8v91H1zpjxdJJSg*1781930136593*1ac5010e49cc94bea22c3e2c01bd4b0c79ab48e39dad7b0f3819b2153a4823aa*R1uGMlKaUxHp8cLTsMSuKS5URMauAhe-cKr9KEq3-Aw" \
  -d '{
    "query": "query { notion: tools(where: { slug: { equals: \"notion\" } }) { id name slug proprietaryAlternatives { id openSourceTool { name slug } } } shopify: tools(where: { slug: { equals: \"shopify\" } }) { id name slug proprietaryAlternatives { id openSourceTool { name slug } } } googleAnalytics: tools(where: { slug: { equals: \"google-analytics\" } }) { id name slug proprietaryAlternatives { id openSourceTool { name slug } } } }"
  }' | jq .)
